head.title: Home - Blum ISD

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.h4:
Please CLICK HERE to view teacher contact information and delivery method of instruction during the school closure.
Blum ISD will be providing meals for students during the closure. Please CLICK HERE and complete the meal request form if you would like to participate.

br.br: Proposed amendment to current local innovation plan.

iframe.style: border: currentColor; border-image: none; overflow: hidden;

h3.style: font-size: 24px; font-family: latobold; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); text-align: left;

div.hr: Blum ISD adopted a tax rate that will raise more taxes for maintenance and operations than last year's tax rate. The tax rate will effectively be raised by 14.8040 percent and will raise taxes for maintenance and operations on a $100,000 home by approximately $1.40
